entry.title: Affairs and Letters
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheStars8

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,948Chapters: 29/30Kudos: 767

Summary: Secure in your position in the Kent household you are more than happy in your station in life. Yet, when the Wayne family enters the town, you are entranced by the second eldest son, Mr. Jason Todd. Between keeping your reputation intact as a polite young lady and dabbling into the follies of love, you’re caught in a scandalous affair that threatens the very thing you are trying to protect. Regency AU!

entry.title: dandelion wine with you
entry.summary:
Author: dreamtiming

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,586Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: You feel like the journey to the wall and back are slow, caught in honeyed amber, captive under the gaze that tracks you through the span of your own store. The flower, the single bloom he requested, feels both leaden and light at once as you turn on your heel to deliver it back to him. He held you moments before, but as your fingers brush against his when you exchange gifts, there’s a tremor of pleasing heat that blooms from your hands outwards, consuming the rest of you. He lifts the flower in toast to you. “To our friendship, sweetheart. Be seein’ you.”—tl;dr: you and your savior communicate in a language only you two know. Jason Todd/Reader

entry.title: futile devices
entry.summary:
Author: al_lion_e

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,535Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 74

Summary: “That’s gonna get infected.” Comes a voice from down the alley, cold and disinterested. You freeze, and look up. “Oh.” “I mean,” says a man in a recognizable red helmet, “unless you disinfect it. Gothams dumpsters carry germs scientists haven’t even discovered.” He's leaning against the brick wall to your right near the entrance of the alley, his broad, intimidating figure literally blotting out the lights beyond. It's strange to see him so close up- in person, not in blurry photographs in magazines, or on the news.   Or: Encounters.

entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,194Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 334

Summary: "Of course I eat people, I mean...It's not something I would broadcast since it's...well Gotham and they began to make a phad about it because the citizens are brilliantly...stupid."Bodies are piling up, whatever is left. Families; different backgrounds, different ethnics, religions, looks are being eaten and whatever is left into a master piece. Some sort of art with the remains and everyone was losing time and leads to find out who has been feasting upon Gotham citizens. Jason however, knew of a Cannibal that he totally never mentioned to Bruce. It's not Jason's fault he died before revealing his darkest discovery and that discovery is in the form of a boy he had left behind.
